title: Coffee House
description: A Chat Application with the help of firebase and firestore. Using React and CSS for UI. You can create Rooms which may have passwords and can invite friends to discuss over a topic

title: Quiz App
description: A quiz app with the help of OpenTriviaDB, NextJS MUI and CSS. You can Select Categories and number of questions and test your knowledge about the topic.

title: Tic Tac 2
description: A Realtime Multiplayer Tic-Tac-Toe game created with the power of Sockets, NextJS and NodeJS. You can create rooms or join rooms and play with your friends.
